member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid
member.summary: Displays hierarchical data in a customizable tree-grid based on DataGrid control.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new DataTreeGrid instance.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.OnApplyTemplate
member.summary: Builds the visual tree for the DataTreeGrid when a new template is applied and updates appropriate internal properties of the control.

member.name: F:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.ItemsProperty
member.summary: Identifies the Items dependency property.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.AttachItem(DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem)
member.summary: Attaches the specified item to this control instance.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.BeginUpdateItems
member.summary: Signals the beginning of a set of updates within the items collection, in order to temporarily remove automatic user interface refreshes during this time, for optimization purposes. When the updates are complete, call method to refresh the user inteface and to revert to its standard behavior.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.EndUpdateItems
member.summary: Signals the end of a set of updates within the items collection initiated by a call, in order to refresh the user interface.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.OnAsyncPresentationStarted
member.summary: Raises the AsyncPresentationStarted event.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.OnAsyncPresentationCompleted
member.summary: Raises the AsyncPresentationCompleted event.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.PauseAsyncPresentation
member.summary: Pauses asynchronous presentation data load, if it was in progress.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.ContinueAsyncPresentation
member.summary: Continues asynchronous presentation data load, if it was in progress and paused.

member.name: F:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.IsAsyncPresentationEnabledProperty
member.summary: Identifies the IsAsyncPresentationEnabled dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the IsAsyncPresentationEnabledMinCount dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the ExpanderTemplate dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the IndentationUnitSize dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the CollapsibilityMaxCount dependency property.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.UpdateActualNodeCollapsibility
member.summary: Updates the property values for all the managed items, if needed, based on the current runtime conditions.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.OnLoadingRow(System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the LoadingRow event and updates internal properties for the data bound item and container element.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.OnUnloadingRow(System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowEventArgs)
member.summary: Updates internal properties for the data bound item and container element and raises the UnloadingRow event.

member.summary: Searches for the specified item and returns its zero-based index in the collection.
member.param: The item to get the index of.
member.returns: The index of the specified item in the collection.

member.summary: Gets the direct parent item of the specified item in the hierarchical collection.
member.param: The item to get the parent of.
member.returns: The parent item of the specified item.

member.summary: Iterates all level parent items of the specified item up in the hierarchical collection.

member.returns: All level parent items of the specified item.

member.returns: All level parent items of the specified item.

member.returns: The child items of the specified item.

member.summary: Iterates the direct child items of the specified item in the hierarchical collection.
member.param: The index of the item to get the children of.
member.returns: The child items of the specified item.

member.summary: Iterates all level child items of the specified item down in the hierarchical collection.

member.returns: All level child items of the specified item.

member.summary: Iterates all level child items of the specified item down in the hierarchical collection.

member.returns: All level child items of the specified item.

member.summary: Iterates the root items in the hierarchical collection.
member.returns: The root items in the collection.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.GetExpandables
member.summary: Iterates the expandable items in the hierarchical collection.
member.returns: The expandable items in the collection.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.GetLeaves
member.summary: Iterates the leaf items in the hierarchical collection.
member.returns: The leaf items in the collection.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.ExpandAll
member.summary: Expands all parent nodes in the hierarchy.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.CollapseAll
member.summary: Collapses all parent nodes in the hierarchy.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.EnsureValidHierarchy
member.summary: Resets any invalid indentation values in order to obtain a valid node hierarchy.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.GetSelectedItems
member.summary: Enumerates the currently visible selected items in the hierarchy and all their child items.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.GetSelectedItemCount
member.summary: Counts the currently visible selected items in the hierarchy and all their child items.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.Move(DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Moves the specified item to a new index in the collection, optionally with its entire following children array. You may call after this operation completes to preserve hierarchical collection validity.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.Move(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the item at the specified index to a new index in the collection. You may call after this operation completes to preserve hierarchical collection validity.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.MoveRange(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the specified range of items from the specified index to a new index in the collection. You may call after this operation completes to preserve hierarchical collection validity.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.MoveUp(DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Moves the specified item up in the collection, optionally with its entire following children array, and optionally ensuring preserving the current parent item.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.CanMoveUp(DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item may be moved up in the collection, optionally with its entire following children array, and optionally ensuring preserving the current parent item.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.MoveDown(DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Moves the specified item down in the collection, optionally with its entire following children array, and optionally ensuring preserving the current parent item.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.CanMoveDown(DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item may be moved down in the collection, optionally with its entire following children array, and optionally ensuring preserving the current parent item.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.DefaultItemComparison(DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem,DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem)
member.summary: Default item comparison for sorting items based on their content.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.Sort(System.Comparison{DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Hierarchically sorts all tree grid items in the collection based on the optionally specified parameters.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.Sort(DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem,System.Comparison{DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Hierarchically sorts the child items within a specified root tree grid item in the collection based on the other optionally specified parameters.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.Switch(DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem,DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Switches two specified items in the collection, optionally with their entire following children arrays.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.Switch(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Switches the items at the specified indexes in the collection.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.SwitchRanges(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Switches the two specified ranges of items in the collection.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.Items
member.summary: Gets a collection of DataTreeGridItem objects that represent the individual items in the DataTreeGrid control. This is a dependency property.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.AsyncPresentationStarted
member.summary: Raised when the asynchronous presentation operations start, during component initialization and when the source item collection changes.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.AsyncPresentationCompleted
member.summary: Raised when the asynchronous presentation operations are completed, during component initialization and when the source item collection changes.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.IsAsyncPresentationEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether asynchronous presentation mode is enabled (true by default). This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.IsAsyncPresentationEnabledMinCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of items to be initially loaded synchronously when using asychronous presentation mode within the control (having IsAsyncPresentationEnabled property set to true). This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.IsAsyncPresentationEnabledPageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of items to be loaded synchronously as one step when using asychronous presentation mode within the control (having IsAsyncPresentationEnabled property set to true). This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.ExpanderTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template used for displaying node expanders in the DataTreeGridColumn cells. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.IndentationUnitSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the indentation left padding used for each hierarchical level in the view. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.CollapsibilityMaxCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the children count limit for parent nodes in order to be collapsible and expandable from the user interface; null by default, indicating that no limit applies. This is a dependency property.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.ItemPropertyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a data property value of an item within the control changes.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.ItemCollectionChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the data item collection within the control changes.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGrid.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the item at the specified index in the collection.
member.param: The index to get the item at.
member.returns: The item at the specified index in the collection.

member.summary: Raises the PropertyChanged event.

member.summary: Raises the ManagedDependencyPropertyChanged event.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.DataTreeGrid
member.summary: Gets the DataTreeGrid control instance of the current item.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the content of the current item, displayed within the DataTreeGrid control. This is a dependency property.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.ContentChanged
member.summary: Occurs when content changes for the current item.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.Indentation
member.summary: Gets or sets the hierarchical indentation level of the current item in the containing collection. This is a dependency property.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.HierarchyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the hierarchy (i.e. indentation level) changes for the current item.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.IndentationWidth
member.summary: Gets the indentation width of the current item, based on Indentation and DataTreeGrid.IndentationUnitSize. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.IsVirtualSummary
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the current item is considered and presented as a summary node even when it doesn't have child items. When a node is set as a virtual summary its initial expansion state is set to collapsed, and the VirtualSummaryInitiallyExpanded event will occur when it will be expanded for the first time, allowing child item initialization (lazy loading). This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.HasChildren
member.summary: Gets whether the current item has children within the containing hierarchical collection. This is a dependency property.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.HasChildrenChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the HasChildren property value of the current item changes.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.IsExpanded
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the current item is expanded or not, if it is a parent node (i.e. has child items). This is a dependency property.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.ExpansionChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the expansion state of the current item changes.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.ExpanderVisibility
member.summary: Gets a Visibility value that indicates whether the current item has an expander to be displayed, i.e. it is a parent node. This is a dependency value.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.VirtualSummaryInitiallyExpanded
member.summary: Occurs once, when the current item gets expanded for the first time, and only if it is set as a virtually summary, allowing child item initialization (lazy loading).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.IsCollapsible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current node should be collapsible and expandable from the user interface when it's a parent node; null by default, indicating that limit applies, if defined. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.IsActuallyCollapsible
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the item is currently collapsible and expandable, based on the and/or settings.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.Parent
member.summary: Gets the direct parent item of the current item in the hierarchical collection.
member.returns: The parent item of the current item.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.AllParents
member.summary: Iterates all level parent items of the current item up in the hierarchical collection.
member.returns: All level parent items of the current item.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.Children
member.summary: Iterates the direct child items of the current item in the hierarchical collection.
member.returns: The child items of the current item.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.AllChildren
member.summary: Iterates all level child items of the current item down in the hierarchical collection.
member.returns: All level child items of the current item.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.IsHidden
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current item is hidden in the view. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.IsVisible
member.summary: Gets whether the current item is visible in the view (a parent node that is not expanded would have its child items not visible). This is a dependency property.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.VisibilityChanged
member.summary: Occurs when visibility of the current item changes.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.Visibility
member.summary: Gets a Visibility value that indicates whether the current item is visible in the view. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.Tag
member.summary: Gets or sets an object that contains information that is associated with the current item.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.Key
member.summary: Gets or sets an associated external numeric key for the current item.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.GlobalKey
member.summary: Gets or sets an associated external globally unique key for the current item.

member.summary: Occurs when a data property value of the item changes.

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItem.ManagedDependencyPropertyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when an internally managed data dependency property value of the item changes.

member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the item in its owner collection.

member.summary: Performs tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting resources.
member.param: Indicates whether unmanaged

member.name: E:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.DataTreeGridItemCollection.ItemPropertyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a data property value of an item in the collection changes.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.NodeItemsConverter
member.summary: Converts custom node items to a collection of DataTreeGridItem objects (as required by Items properties of DataTreeGrid component). Use *Member properties of the converter instance to control which properties of custom items are bound to which DataTreeGridItem properties (undefined/null Member values indicate properties that are not bound and default values are automatically generated for these properties on DataTreeGridItem objects instead). The converter uses reflection to retreive the appropriate property values from your custom data objects and apply them to the corresponding DataTreeGridItem instances. Referred member properties of custom items should be public and accessible for reading and optionally writing (property paths are not supported). Set UpdateSourceOnTargetChanges and/or UpdateTargetOnSourceChanges properties to true/false to indicate the directions of internally managed change updates. Note that UpdateTargetOnSourceChanges works only when the custom data source implements INotifyCollectionChanged interface and/or custom data objects implement INotifyPropertyChanged interface. When UpdateSourceOnTargetChanges is set new objects that need to be created are generated by Activator.CreateInstance internal calls, and therefore they need to provide public access to their parameterless constructor (or their default constructor).

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.NodeItemsConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts custom node items to a collection of DataTreeGridItem objects (as required by Items properties of DataTreeGrid component).

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.NodeItemsConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Throws a not supported exception as two way conversion is internally implemented and may be configured using the UpdateSourceOnTargetChanges and UpdateTargetOnSourceChanges properties of the converter.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.NodeItemsConverter.ContentMember
member.summary: Gets or sets the property name of custom node items that Content property of DataTreeGridItem objects should be bound to. Source object values retreived by the custom property may be of any type (including string). This property can be set only at initialization time (an exception is thrown if it is set after having the conversion process started).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.NodeItemsConverter.IndentationMember
member.summary: Gets or sets the property name of custom node items that Indentation property of DataTreeGridItem objects should be bound to. Source object values retreived by the custom property need to be of integral type. This property can be set only at initialization time (an exception is thrown if it is set after having the conversion process started).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.NodeItemsConverter.IsExpandedMember
member.summary: Gets or sets the property name of custom node items that IsExpanded property of DataTreeGridItem objects should be bound to. Source object values retreived by the custom property need to be of Boolean type. This property can be set only at initialization time (an exception is thrown if it is set after having the conversion process started).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.NodeItemsConverter.UpdateSourceOnTargetChanges
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data source is automatically updated when target DataTreeGridItem objects generated by the converter get their internally bound values changed. Set this property to false when the feature is not needed, e.g. when the user interface is read only (by default it is set to true in order to automatically propagate changes back to the data source as expected in most situations). This property can be set only at initialization time (an exception is thrown if it is set after having the conversion process started).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.NodeItemsConverter.UpdateTargetOnSourceChanges
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether target DataTreeGridItem objects generated by the converter are automatically updated when internally bound data source values change. Set this property to true only when the feature is needed, i.e. when code behind changes the data source while the user interface presents it and all changes should be automatically reflected on screen (by default it is set to false in order to provide increased performance). Note that automatic updates work only when the custom data source implements INotifyCollectionChanged interface and/or custom data objects implement INotifyPropertyChanged interface. This property can be set only at initialization time (an exception is thrown if it is set after having the conversion process started).

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Licensing.DataTreeGrid
member.summary: Provides licensing utilities for DataTreeGrid control.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.Licensing.DataTreeGrid.SetLicense(System.String)
member.summary: Predefines the license content to be considered for DataTreeGrid component instances, at initialization time.
member.param: The XML content string of the license to be defined for this component type.
